summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1817, for the improvement of East Mercer Street, in the City of Seattle, from Belmont Avenue North to North Broadway, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 19009, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
